ygData.subject: Re: Battle of the Titans
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael: I admit it. No Decepticon was ever a slave. Too stubborn and violent to be one, and way too deceptive. But you will never be the power you once were.

Tyrael: I admit it. No Decepticon was ever a slave. Too stubborn and
violent to be one, and way too deceptive. But you will never be the
power you once were. Clinging to that fading dream is futile and vain.
It wastes your efforts. Whatever plan Alpha Trion had for you, it
might not be one that includes giving you commands. You play the part
he has given you, just as I am playing a part given to me by my ancestors.

He raises a hand and unleashes a massive surge of coherent light at
Maxima.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She only felt the burning as she yelped.
> 
> Stumbling she twisted around & glared at Tyrael. Fluid dripped from the 
> laceration that the talons caused upon the side of her right cheek,
looked almost 
> like blood, but it wasn't. 
> 
> She glared at Tyrael as Hydras fought back. She panted as she tried
to stay 
> on her feet. 
> 
> "Alpha Trion... is.. an old.. Autobot.. Fool! He .. governs my..
existance... 
> as much as Unicron .. could destroy... the ... Matrix." She knew
Alpha Trion 
> had a hold in her resurrection & refusal to restore her old form. At
least... 
> not yet. But... she would never let Alpha Trion tell her what to do.
He was 
> not her Mentor.... Gamma was. 
> 
> "NO .. Decepticon.. is a.. Slave!" she growled.
